snippet: Bart Chilton, a regulator at the Commodity Futures Trading Commission, plans on Tuesday to urge financial firms and federal authorities to bolster coordination in the face of future calamities.
abstract: Bart Chilton, a regulator at the Commodity Futures Trading Commission, plans on Tuesday to urge financial firms and federal authorities to bolster coordination in the face of future calamities.

headline.main: Regulator to Press for Financial Response Team for Disasters
